bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.translation: For their taming (We cause) the caravans to set forth in winter and summer.
So let them worship the Lord of this House,

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
rows.translation: Who hath fed them against hunger and hath made them safe from fear.
rows.transliteration: alladhī aṭ`amahum min jū`in wa-āmanahum min khawf
